sourcesContent: import NumberInput from '@components/number-input' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Label, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap' const NumberInputSizes = () => { return ( Sizes Just like other Bootstrap Components, <NumberInput /> supports small and large sizing via setting the size prop to either 'sm' or 'lg', respectively. ) } export default NumberInputSizes
